      • getCost

        private static void getCost(Node currentNode,
                            Node testNode,
                            int cost)
        Set the cost of the passed Node (testNode) to the passed cost and the parentNode to the passed Node (currentNode).
        Parameters:
        currentNode - Is passed to set the parentNode of the testNode
        testNode - The currently tested Node
        cost - The cost of the currently tested Node
